trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects that represent a single row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Incapsula una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano una singola riga in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa classe per gestire a livello di codice un insieme di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add or remove rows from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene in genere utilizzata per aggiungere o rimuovere le righe da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>controllo contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>raccolta che rappresenta una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> represents an individual row in the table and contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>rappresenta una singola riga nella tabella e contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>raccolta che rappresenta una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects represent the individual cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: Questi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>oggetti rappresentano le singole celle nella tabella.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: To get an individual cell, you must first get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere una singola cella, è innanzitutto necessario ottenere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>raccolta di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: You can then get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile ottenere una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto alla fine del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> object to the end of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetto alla fine di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dell'oggetto per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per inserire l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> in cui aggiungere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Appends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetti dalla matrice specificata alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the AddRange method to append the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects from the specified array to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo AddRange per accodare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti dalla matrice specificata alla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you are constructing a table.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene in genere utilizzato quando si crea una tabella.

trans-unit.source: To construct a table, first create an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects to represent the rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una tabella, creare prima una matrice di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti per rappresentare le righe della tabella.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: Next, use the AddRange method, passing the array as an argument, to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, utilizzare il metodo AddRange, passando una matrice come argomento, per aggiungere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti alla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The array containing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La matrice che contiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The value of the rows parameter is .
trans-unit.target: Il valore di rows parametro .

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> controls from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dei controlli di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>oggetti dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>e impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>proprietà su 0.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting with the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> specificata <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato di <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per copiare il contenuto del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `array` parametro deve essere in base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> che riceve gli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive copied contents.
trans-unit.target: La prima posizione nell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> per ricevere il contenuto copiato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare il numero di righe in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is often used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count viene spesso utilizzata quando si scorre la raccolta per determinare il limite superiore.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> gli oggetti all'interno di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per creare un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto che può scorrere facilmente per ottenere ogni elemento nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> implementato</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per ottenere l'elemento attualmente fa riferimento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per spostare l'elemento successivo della raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eseguire il metodo per spostare l'enumeratore per la posizione iniziale.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object or using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo deve essere chiamato dopo la creazione di un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>implementato oggetto o l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per spostare l'enumeratore al primo elemento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, l'elemento rappresentato dal <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà non è definita.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> gli oggetti all'interno di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che rappresenta l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per determinare l'indice di specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> is not found, an index of -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>non è viene trovato, viene restituito un indice di -1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto da cercare nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> within the collection.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice ordinale dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> all'interno della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> has not been found.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è -1, che indica che l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre `false` per indicare che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>possono essere scritti in tutti i casi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>per tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>proprietà, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>per tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> at the specified index using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l'indicizzatore per ottenere un singolo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato utilizzando la notazione di matrice semplice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index value that specifies which <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to return.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di indice ordinale che specifica quali <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: This index is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Questo indice è in base zero.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> that represents an element in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> che rappresenta un elemento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere lo specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> object to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection> itself.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the object within the collection; otherwise, -1 if the object is not in the collection.
